title: Actress Catherine O'Hara's Passing
summary: Catherine O'Hara, a famous actress, died at age 71 in a Los Angeles hospital on January 30. Her death was caused by a blood clot in her lungs, called a pulmonary embolism. She also had rectal cancer, which she had been treating since March 2025. O'Hara was known for her roles in shows like Schitt's Creek and movies like Home Alone. Many people, including actors Seth Rogen and Pedro Pascal, shared kind words about her. They said she was funny, kind, and a great person to work with. Her co-stars, like Eugene Levy and Dan Levy, also expressed sadness and called her family. O'Hara won awards for her acting and made many people laugh and smile.

background_read: Catherine O'Hara was a beloved actress from Canada who made people laugh in many TV shows and movies. She started acting a long time ago and became famous for her funny roles. In recent years, she worked on popular shows and won awards for her performances. Her death has made many fans and friends sad, and they remember her as a kind and talented person.
